plot: The Cistercian abbey of Acey is about to be torn down. Soon, nothing will remain, except for perhaps the old stone stairs. For memory's sake, I film.
title: Avant de dire adieu
plot_es: The Cistercian abbey of Acey is about to be torn down. Soon, nothing will remain, except for perhaps the old stone stairs. For memory's sake, I film.
plot_en: The Cistercian abbey of Acey is about to be torn down. Soon, nothing will remain, except for perhaps the old stone stairs. For memory's sake, I film.
